tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS). Memory leaks or excessive memory retention occur, particularly during high-volume or large request processing in Laravel Octane when using the Swoole server (ConvertSwooleRequestToIlluminateRequest.php).
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges and you are using the Swoole server.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `laravel/octane` library to the patch version.
